structure.unit: ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES -- PROHIBITIONS, RESTRICTIONS, AND REGULATIONS

law.catch_line: Package retailer not to deliver nor advertise delivery.
law.text: No retailer of distilled spirits or wine by the package shall deliver or advertise the delivery of distilled spirits and wine.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 435, sec. 16, effective July 14, 2000. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554b-186.
